name: Ready For The World?
description:
Can you find hiding numbers, letters, and 2d shapes in this kid friendly platformer learning game that up to 4 players can have fun with together...

Voice Acting explains everything, BE PREPARED TO LEARN!?

Story: Before we send you to earth little Eggie, there are some things you need to know... We have prepared some learning challenges for you, pass these and you can proceed Down to Earth. Meow -Space Cats 

[Why did the space cats send eggies to earth? Because they need edible intelligent minions beings that can populate the earth!]

Use your mouse and keyboard or a gamepad.

This game autosaves so feel free to exit levels and return to continue with your progression.

Finish the alphabet level to unlock the ending! 

Made Content: Voice acting, lots of textures, widgets, programming, concept, and other stuff.

Used content:
Unreal Engine Third person template

Unreal Engine Rolling ball template (btw, the physics was wrong on that template)

Cat (without spaceship which was made by me) - Marc Mons

Stylized Low Poly Landscapes (marketplace)

Advanced Cel Shader Lite (marketplace)

Ai Buddy Bird Wings & Anim (the egg buddy) - Animal Pack Ultra (marketplace)

Footsteps Sounds with Blueprint (marketplace)

Some sounds - Retro 8Bit Sounds (marketplace)

Fireworks from Fireworks Particle Effects (marketplace)

Luos 365 Particles Free (marketplace) 

Dapper Hats Pack (marketplace)

Music: Fantasy Orchestral (marketplace)

changelog:

v.6 fixes gamepads not being assigned to player 1 when 2 or more players are active
